name: Bird Sort Puzzle
description:
Bird Sort Puzzle - Latest free sorting puzzle game with new art style, collection of colorful birds. Bird Sort will definitely make you enjoy while training your brain. This sorting game stimulates your brain in a very fun and challenging way. It's easy to play with one finger control and suitable for all ages. Test your IQ by passing unique levels and unlocking new challenges. Play Bird Sort now for free and enjoy super fun challenges and awesome brain teasers!

HOW TO PLAY
- Move the bird by touching it and then touching the branch you want it to move to.
- Arrange the birds using the fewest possible moves!
- Try not to get stuck. If you get stuck you can just go back step by step using the back button or restart the level at any time using the restart button.

CHARACTERISTICS
- Easy to play but hard to master.
- Best graphics and sound in each category.
- Collect coins to unlock a variety of birds and beautiful backgrounds.
- Unlimited time! Play for free.
- Hundreds of challenging kitchen puzzle levels to keep you entertained for hours.
Let's sort all the color birds NOW!!!
